pcd.ass03.ex01.utils

Interface Combination

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombinationImpl

    public interface Combination
    This class represents a generic combination, generated by a player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COMBINATION_RANGE
      It characterizes the range of integers used to represent an element of the combination.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean compare(CombinationImpl toCompare)
      Checks whether the passed combination is equal to the current.
      int computeGuessedCyphers(CombinationImpl toCompare)
      Returns the number of cyphers that are in common between combination, but NOT in the same place.
      int computeGuessedPositions(CombinationImpl toCompare)
      Returns the number of cyphers that are in the same place, with the same value.
      static Combination of(int combinationSize)
      Factory to generate a random combination.

    • Field Detail

      • COMBINATION_RANGE

        static final int COMBINATION_RANGE
        It characterizes the range of integers used to represent an element of the combination. Using decimal cyphers from 0 to 9, the range is 10.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        boolean compare(CombinationImpl toCompare)
        Checks whether the passed combination is equal to the current.
        Parameters:
        toCompare - the combination to compare with the current.
        Returns:
        true if the combination are equals, false otherwise.

      • computeGuessedPositions

        int computeGuessedPositions(CombinationImpl toCompare)
        Returns the number of cyphers that are in the same place, with the same value.
        Parameters:
        toCompare - the combination to compare with the current.
        Returns:
        the number of cyphers that are in the same place, with the same value. If the size of the lists are different, it returns 0.

      • computeGuessedCyphers

        int computeGuessedCyphers(CombinationImpl toCompare)
        Returns the number of cyphers that are in common between combination, but NOT in the same place.
        Parameters:
        toCompare - the combination to compare with the current.
        Returns:
        the number of cyphers that are in common between combination, but NOT in the same place. If the size of the lists are different, it returns 0.

      • of

        static Combination of(int combinationSize)
        Factory to generate a random combination.
        Parameters:
        combinationSize - the number of chyphers of the combination
        Returns:
        the new combination
